schemes.description: A scheme to promote education among Scheduled Caste girls by providing financial incentives for completing their education.

eligibility_criteria.income: Guardians should not be income taxpayers

schemes.application_process: Apply online via the official state government portal, if available, or submit an offline application to the District Social Welfare Office or school administration.

schemes.scheme_name: Indira Gandhi National Widow Pension Scheme
schemes.description: It is a non-contributory pension scheme to provide social security to widows of poor family (BPL)  of the society.
required_documents: Death Certificate of husband - With the name of the surviving wife(widow).
schemes.benefits: A pension of Rs.300/- per month to Widows between 40 years and 79 years, and pension of Rs.500/- per month for persons who are 80 years and above.
schemes.application_process: Submit an offline application at your local Block Development Office/Municipality with required documents or apply online via the UMANG app or NSAP portal.

schemes.description: It promotes financial inclusion by providing banking services to unbanked adults, with enhanced overdraft limits and insurance coverage.

eligibility_criteria.nationality: Applicant should be an Indian National.

schemes.benefits: A Basic Savings Bank Deposit Account (BSBDA) with no minimum balance requirement and a limit of 4 withdrawals per month. Small accounts can be opened without legal documents, valid for 12 months and extended if an official document application is submitted. Beneficiaries receive a free RuPay debit card with accident insurance coverage of ₹2 lakhs (₹1 lakh for accounts opened before 28.08.2018). An overdraft facility of up to ₹10,000 is available, and Business Correspondents (BCs) or Bank Mitras provide banking services in remote areas, assisting with savings, deposits, and withdrawals.
schemes.application_process: Visit a nearby bank branch with valid identification and provide required documents. Minors above 10 years need a guardian's support for account management.
required_documents: Government ID proofs (Voter Card/PAN Card/Ration card)
Permanent Address proof (Passport/Driving License/Electricity Bill/Telephone Bill/Water Bill)

schemes.description: MP Gaon Ki Beti Yojna scholarship is an initiative to support the education of girl children from rural areas who have passed Class 12 with first division.

eligibility_criteria.education_level: Secured 60% or more marks in the 12th examination.

schemes.benefits: Assistance up to Rs. 5000/- is provided annually to the girl student.
required_documents: Current college code and branch code
Mobile number and email id of the candidate

schemes.description: To provide protection and assistance against domestic violence, thereby implementing the Women's Protection from Domestic Violence Act 2005, Rule 2006.
schemes.benefits: Providing protection and support against domestic violence
schemes.application_process: Applicants have to visit the following centers- Protection Officer (Project Officer-Integrated Child Development Project Office), One Stop Center operated in the district, Police Station.
